Sqrt(2)^2 = 2
(2^(1/5))^5 = 2
ln(exp(pi)) = 3.14159265358979
(pi^e)^(1/e) = 3.14159265358979
gamma(1) = 0.999999989064903
gamma(2) = 0.999999989064903
gamma(3) = 1.99999997812981
gamma(4) = 5.99999993438942
